name: NSBinarySearchingOptions
desc: Options for searches and insertions using index(of:inSortedRange:options:usingComparator:).

items.name: static var firstEqual: NSBinarySearchingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the search should return the first object in the range that is equal to the given object.

items.name: static var lastEqual: NSBinarySearchingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the search should return the last object in the range that is equal to the given object.

items.name: static var insertionIndex: NSBinarySearchingOptions
items.desc: Returns the index at which you should insert the object in order to maintain a sorted array.
